node.statement: HARMONIC MEAN FROM COUPLING: Given J_p*J_q >= ||h||^4 (from 1.3.4), we have (Phi_p - Phi_r)(Phi_q - Phi_r) >= Phi_r^2. Expanding: Phi_p*Phi_q - Phi_r*(Phi_p+Phi_q) + Phi_r^2 >= Phi_r^2, so Phi_p*Phi_q >= Phi_r*(Phi_p+Phi_q). Dividing by Phi_p*Phi_q*Phi_r: 1/Phi_r >= 1/Phi_p + 1/Phi_q. QED for Path A.
